page.title: 07RECREATION = HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: Sport and recreation are an important part of life in Hemel and this is well provided for with a wide range of facilities. We have a large Sports Centre which provides for many different sports and activities from swimming, racquets games and gymnastics to weight training, roller skating and mountaineering. Nearby is the town Cricket Ground. The Grand Union Canal offers canoeing, coarse fishing, barge holidays and walking. There are numerous football pitches throughout the area. Ten pin Bowling and Basketball are both popular to play and watch and some matches get many spectators. People who want to learn to ski or practise can do so at the ski centre where there is an artificial slope.There are over 60 different clubs catering for Sports and Recreation in the town.
